title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 197.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 197.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

The Department shall be subject to annual caps as articulated
in subdivision one of section
359
of
the Economic Development Law, both for traditional Excelsior projects and the
annual cap articulated in subdivision four of section
359
of
the economic development law for Green CHIPS projects. In the case of Green
CHIPS projects, a given year's cap shall be the sum of $500 million and the
balance of any available carry forward credits not yet issued and allowed
pursuant to such section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
197.1

Amended

New

York State Register May 3, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 18, eff. 5/3/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
